instruccions.text:
WASD -> To move
LMB -> To attack
E -> To equip item

story.text1:
After an unmemorable time you awaken,
not knowing where you are or where to go.
A call to adventure overwhelms you,
to satisfy that feeling you embark on a journey
to the deepest part of the human world
in search of meaning.
story.text2:
After solving the puzzle,
you descend even further into the abyss.
Although unaware of the calamities you might face,
you continue on with your adventure.

demo_end.text:
This is where the current game demo ends,
I hope you enjoyed it
